vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
κατά-παυσις, εως, ἡ,
stopping: metaphorically, putting down, deposing, [Refs 5th c.BC+]; τῆς βασιληΐης deposition from.., [Refs 2nd c.AD+].
__II rest, calm, [LXX], +others; place of rest, [LXX+4-3rd c.BC+]: metaphorically, allaying, [Refs 1st c.BC+] K.
vocabInfos.mediumDef: primarily the act of giving rest; a state of settled or final rest, Heb. 3:11, 18; 4:1, 3, 4, 5, 11; a place of rest, place of abode, dwelling, habitation, Acts 7:49*
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
1) 靜止安息 (徒 7:49)
2) 安憩的地方
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
1) 静止安息 (徒 7:49)
2) 安憩的地方
vocabInfos._vi_Definition: sự nghỉ ngơi; sự yên nghỉ
